Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class FlightBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.FlightBookingSystem
public class FlightBookingSystem extends Object
The FlightBookingSystem class represents the core functionality of the Flight Booking System. It manages flights, customers, and bookings within the system.

    • FlightBookingSystem

      public FlightBookingSystem()
      Constructs a FlightBookingSystem object. Initializes the system date and data structures for customers, flights, and bookings.

    • getSystemDate

      public LocalDate getSystemDate()

      Returns:
      the system date.

    • getFlights

      public List<Flight> getFlights()
      Returns a list of all flights in the system.
      Returns:
      the list of flights.

    • getFlightByID

      public Flight getFlightByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Retrieves a flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the flight to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The flight with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if no flight is found with the provided ID.

    • getCustomerByID

      public Customer getCustomerByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Retrieves a customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The customer with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if no customer is found with the provided ID.

    • getFlightByNumber

      public Flight getFlightByNumber(String flightNumber)
      Retrieves a flight by its flight number.
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - The Flight Number to search for
      Returns:
      The Flight with the specified flight number, or null if not found.

    • addFlight

      public void addFlight(Flight flight) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a new flight to the system.
      Parameters:
      flight - The Flight to add.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if a flight with the same ID already exists.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(Customer customer) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a new customer to the Flight Booking System.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer to add.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if a customer with the same email already exists.

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(int customerId, int flightId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Cancels a booking for a specified customer and flight.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer whose booking is to be cancelled.
      flightId - The ID of the flight for which the booking is to be cancelled.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the customer does not have a booking for the specified flight.

    • getBookingById

      public Booking getBookingById(int bookingId)
      Retrieves a booking by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the unique identifier of the booking to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the booking with the specified ID, or null if no booking is found.

    • editBooking

      public void editBooking(int bookingId, int flightId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Edits a booking by changing the associated flight.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The Unique Identifier of the booking to edit.
      flightId - The Unique Identifier of the new flight to associate with the booking.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the booking, old flight, or new flight is not found, or if there is an issue editing the booking.

    • removeBooking

      public void removeBooking(Booking booking)
      Removes the specified booking from the list of bookings.
      Parameters:
      booking - the booking to be removed.

    • getNextCustomerId

      public static int getNextCustomerId()
      Retrieves the next available customer ID and increments the counter.
      Returns:
      the next available customer ID.

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(Booking booking)
      Adds the provided booking to the list of bookings.
      Parameters:
      booking - the booking to be added.

    • getBookings

      public List<Booking> getBookings()
      Retrieves a list of all bookings in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all bookings.

    • getCustomers

      public List<Customer> getCustomers()
      Retrieves a list of all customers in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all customers.

    • deleteCustomer

      public boolean deleteCustomer(int customerId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Deletes a customer with the specified ID from the Flight Booking System.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the customer is successfully deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the customer with the specified ID is not found.

    • deleteFlight

      public void deleteFlight(String selectedFlightNumber) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Deletes a flight with the specified flight number from the Flight Booking System.
      Parameters:
      selectedFlightNumber - The flight number of the flight to be deleted.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if the flight with the specified flight number is not found.
